# R in Google Colab
Run R programs in Google Colab: You can use R programming language in Google Colab by going to https://colab.to/r. It will open a new notebook with R set as the kernel instead of Python.

# Auto Timing Exe in Google Colab
Timing Execution of Cell: hover over the cell run icon and you will get an estimate of the execution time taken
